# miae

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

miae is an R package for multiple imputation through autoencoders. It's currently under development.


## 1. Installation

You can install the current development version of miae from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("agnesdeng/miae")
```
